name: Artoo (V)
Lore: 'Counterpart to C-3PO. Spy. Obstinate, headstrong and always full of surprises. R2-D2 was an integral part of Luke Skywalker''s rescue plans.',
Text: 'Heroic. Death Star Plans ignores objective game text, but only draws one destiny. Leia may not move (or be carried) the turn she is released. Once per game, may deploy Trash Compactor from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. May not be Undercover, ''choked,'' or targeted by Emperor.(Original concept by Jared Lockwood - Origins V-Lite 2005)',
